projects.name: Book Swap Project
projects.desc: This Was a team exercise we did during the IO Academy Course, in a team of 4 we were tasked with creating a book swap website, where a user can take out a book, review a book and add new books.

projects.name: Matt's Premier League Card Collecttion
projects.desc: Using PHP and SQL we were tasked with creating a collection site, this project was about functionality not making it look great. The site needed to be able to add new items, remove items(soft delete only), filter items by one field, have a search bar and also be able to compare 2 items.
